content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.zorzenon-brazil-tz'> <front> <title>Abbreviations for Brazilian Time Zones</title>  <author initials='P' surname='Zorzenon' fullname='Pedro Zorzenon'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='November' day='12' year='2004' />  <abstract><t>There are lots of diferent abbreviations used in computer world for Brazilian timezones. This document intend to standardize them.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-zorzenon-brazil-tz-00' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-zorzenon-brazil-tz-00.txt' /> </reference>
